sidebar.dashboardDesc: Main detail info of your asset property.
sidebar.assetsDesc: Asset property that is rented to tenants.
sidebar.tenantsDesc: Tenants that rent your asset property.
sidebar.tenureContractsDesc: Tenure contract of the asset property and tenant.

register.desc1: By register, you will experience how this tool can help you manage your property effectively.
register.desc2: Free To Use If you're just started to manage your property.
register.desc3: We will be helping you as much as needed to familiar and be productive in Propster.io.
register.registerSuccessfullyText: You have registered an account in Propster.io successfully.
register.verifyEmail: Please make sure to verify the email before logging in.
register.moreQuestions: If you have more questions, don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to help!
register.noVerificationEmail: If you have not received any verification email, click the Resend Verification Email.

forgotPassword.forgotPasswordSuccessfully: If you've provided registered e-mail, you should get recovery e-mail shortly.

resetPassword.resetPasswordSuccessfully: We have emailed your password reset link!

selectRole.title: Please Select A Role
selectRole.landlordDesc: Having the access to multiple features such as Tenant management, Asset Managements and Assets Analytics.
selectRole.tenantDesc: Having access to pay rents, scheduling time with Vendors and Landlords.
selectRole.agentDesc: Having access to manage multiple landlords, and to all the features provided to landlords.
selectRole.vendorDesc: Having access to collect fee from agents, landlords or tenants.
selectRole.changeRoleLater: You will be able to select another role later.

dashboard.overdueIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that have already been due over the due date (incl. of Grace Period).
dashboard.upcomingIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that you are expected to receive in the set given time range.
dashboard.overdueExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are been due to. For eg. Maintaince fees that is overdue.
dashboard.upcomingExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are expected to pay in the set given time range.

alert.basicTierAssetCount: You can only add 1 Asset with free tier. Get ADVANCED or PRO version to add more assets.
alert.basicTierTenantCount: You can only add 3 Tenants per Asset with free tier. Get ADVANCED or PRO version to add more tenants.
alert.noAssetAlert: There is no Asset. Please create one.
alert.noTenantAlert: There is no Tenant. Please create one.
alert.noTenureContractAlert: There is no tenure contract of this tenant. Please create one.
alert.noBillingRecordAlert: There is no billing of this tenant. Please create one.
alert.redirectingToPreviousPage: This page is not allowed. Redirecting to the previous page.
alert.assetSuccessfullyAddedText: Do you want to add a Tenant into this asset right now?
alert.assetFailedAdded: Asset is Failed to be Added
alert.noAssetAddingTenant: There is no Asset. Please add an Asset before adding Tenant.
alert.tenantSuccessfullyAddedText: Do you want to add a Tenure Contract for this tenant right now?
alert.tenantFailedAdded: Tenant is Failed to be Added
alert.noAssetAddingTenureContract: There is no Asset. Please add an Asset before adding Tenure Contract.
alert.noTenantAddingTenureContract: There is no Tenant. Please add a Tenant before adding Tenure Contract.
alert.tenureContractSuccessfullyAddedText: Do you want to add a Rental Billing for this tenure contract right now?
alert.tenureContractFailedAdded: Tenure Contract is Failed to be Added
alert.tenureContractFailedAddedText: There can only be 1 Tenure Contract for each Tenant.
alert.tenureContractFailedAddedTextInTenantDet: Tenure Contract can only be added in Tenant Detail.
alert.billingRecordFailedAdded: Billing is Failed to be Added
alert.billingRecordFailedAddedText: There can only be 1 Billing for each Tenure Contract.
alert.billingRecordFailedAddedTextInTenantDeta: Billing can only be added in Tenant Detail and Tenure Contract Detail.
alert.billingPaymentFailedAdded: Billing Record is Failed to be Added
alert.billingPaymentFailedAddedText: Billing Record cannot be added manually. It is generated automatically by Billing System.
alert.noAssetAddingBillingRecord: There is no Asset. Please add an Asset before adding Billing.
alert.noTenantAddingBillingRecord: There is no Tenant. Please add a Tenant before adding Billing.
alert.paymentRecordFailedAdded: Payment Record is Failed to be Added
alert.paymentRecordFailedAddedTextInTenantDeta: Payment Record can only be added in Tenant Detail.
alert.noAssetAddingPaymentRecord: There is no Asset. Please add an Asset before adding Payment Record.
alert.noTenantAddingPaymentRecord: There is no Tenant. Please add a Tenant before adding Payment Record.
alert.assetExpenseFailedAdded: Asset Expense is Failed to be Added
alert.noAssetAddingAssetExpense: There is no Asset. Please add an Asset before adding Asset Expense.
alert.givenDataIsInvalid: Given data is invalid. Please check the input field(s).
alert.actionIsUnauthorized: Oops! Something wrong. Please refresh the page.
alert.featureDeveloping: This feature is still being developed. Please stay tuned.
alert.facebookMessengerAlert: Feel free to give us a feedback. We will attend to you ASAP!
alert.todoListFailedAdded: To-Do List is Failed to be Added
alert.dummyData: This is just a dummy data for displaying purpose.

property.endOfMonthBillingFalse: At The Date Of First Billing
